body.description: We are a long-standing lithium battery manufacturer that offers powerful and durable products to customers from global market. Your devices will have high performance when powered by our high-capacity batteries. In this product, every battery has individual cell for safe storage and long shelf life. Please follow instructions on the back of product package to properly use and store batteries. Under good storage conditions, our batteries hold 100% power for 3 years. A ‘Best If Used By’ Date is specified on the back of product package for your reference. Please feel free to contact us if you have any questions about our products. We will provide product support any time if you ask. We also welcome you to share user experience with the community by writing product review!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Performance and Value for the Money
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the PGSONIC CR2450 3V Lithium Battery pack, and I must say, I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. These batteries have proven to be reliable and long-lasting, exceeding my expectations in every way.First and foremost, the performance of these batteries is outstanding. They have consistently provided a steady and reliable power supply, ensuring my devices operate smoothly without any interruptions. Whether I'm using them in my car key fob, digital scales, or small electronic devices, these batteries have consistently delivered excellent performance.Moreover, the longevity of these batteries is remarkable. I have been using them for several months now, and they continue to power my devices without any signs of deterioration. This not only saves me the hassle of frequently replacing batteries but also saves me money in the long run.One of the things that impressed me the most about these batteries is their value for money. With the PGSONIC CR2450 3V Lithium Battery pack, I received five high-quality batteries at an affordable price. Considering their superior performance and long-lasting nature, it's a cost-effective investment that I can rely on.Another aspect worth mentioning is the convenient packaging of these batteries. Each battery is individually wrapped, ensuring they remain fresh and protected until they are ready to be used. This attention to detail speaks to the quality and care that PGSONIC puts into their products.Lastly, I appreciate the eco-friendly nature of these batteries. They are made of lithium, a recyclable material, which aligns with my commitment to reducing waste and being environmentally conscious.In conclusion, I highly recommend the PGSONIC CR2450 3V Lithium Battery pack. Their exceptional performance, long-lasting power, affordability, and eco-friendly design make them an excellent choice. Whether you need batteries for everyday devices or specialized equipment, these batteries will not disappoint. Don't hesitate to give them a try; you won't be disappointed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 🔋💪 Power Up Your Devices - Unleash the Energy for All Your Needs! ⚡🔌
reviews.reviewText: Once upon a time in a world of endless battery hunting, I stumbled upon PGSONIC CR2450 Lithium Batteries, and my devices have never been happier! These aren't just batteries; they're the life force that keeps your gadgets running smoothly. Let the power play begin! 💥📱🅰️🅰️ Grade AA Awesomeness: These batteries are like the superheroes of the battery world. With 3 Volts of fresh, reliable power, they pack a punch! High energy density and capacity? You bet! It's like giving your devices a dose of rocket fuel.🕰️ Time-Traveling Shelf-Life: Ever found a dead battery when you needed it most? Not with these champs! They boast a whopping 5 years of shelf-life, making them the MVPs of longevity. Premium performance? Check and mate!🚫 Zero Drama, Zero Leaks: Say goodbye to battery meltdowns! These batteries are ultra safe and leak-proof. They contain 0% mercury and come armed with special sealing and coating technology. No mess, no stress!🧞‍♂️ Versatile Wizards: These batteries don't discriminate. They work their magic in flameless candles, lights, remote controls, key fobs, alarm/contact sensors, smart devices, and more. It's like having a battery wizard in your pocket!🔄 Equivalent to Legends: If you're into battery name-dropping, these are equivalent to models like DL2450, ECR2450, GPCR2450, and the iconic CR 2450. They're the A-listers of the battery world!In a world of fading power and battery woes, PGSONIC CR2450 Lithium Batteries are here to save the day. They're not just batteries; they're the secret sauce to keeping your devices alive and kicking. Get ready to power up and conquer the world! ⚡📱🔋

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dependable Key Fob Batteries
reviews.reviewText: The PGSONIC CR2450 batteries fit perfectly in my Ford Explorer and Jeep Gladiator key fobs. While I can't comment on longevity yet, they work seamlessly, providing a quick response. Their compatibility with multiple vehicles is a significant plus. Overall, a reliable choice for hassle-free performance.
